powergrid.control

Class XMLToolBox

  • java.lang.Object
    • powergrid.control.XMLToolBox

  • public class XMLToolBox
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class providing methods for handling XML files

        Parses an XML Tree from the given InputStream
        Parameters:
        in - the InputStream to parse an XMLTree from
        Returns:

      • filterNodes

        public static XMLNode[] filterNodes(java.lang.Iterable<XMLNode> root,
                    java.lang.String attribute,
                    java.lang.String value)
        Searches the given XMLNode for direct children that have the given attribute set to the given value.
        Parameters:
        root - the root XMLNode
        attribute - the attribute to look for
        value - the value this attribute must have in order to be accepted
        Returns:
        an array of XMLNodes matching the filter

      • filterNodesRecursive

      • binarySearch

        public static XMLNode binarySearch(java.util.List<XMLNode> list,
                   java.lang.String att,
                   java.lang.String value)
        Binary searches the given List of XMLNodes for the required attribute-value pair.

        This method requires the List to be sorted on the provided attribute name.

        Parameters:
        list - the List to binary search in
        att - the attribute by which the list is sorted
        value - the value for the given attribute to search for
        Returns:
        the XMLNode with the correct attribute-value pair

      • getXMLTree

        public static XMLNode getXMLTree(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> lines)
        Creates an XML Tree from the given list of lines, where every String element represents one XML Tag
        Parameters:
        lines - a List of XML Strings
        Returns:
        an XML tree created from the list of XML Strings

      • writeToFile

        public static boolean writeToFile(java.lang.Object o,
                  java.lang.String file)
